betterquesting:10.desc:8:
If you're going to make Mekanism machines, then you will need a §ereliant power source to connect your machines to§r. A generator is sure to solve that issue.

Let's make a §6Heat Generator§r, which will output energy (§7energy is measured in §cRF§r§7, or §cRedstone Flux§7§7§r§7, here§r) depending on the §esurrounding temperature§r, like lava or fire.

To make one, you need §6Iron Ingot§rs, a §6Furnace§r, §6Osmium Ingot§r, §6Copper Ingot§rs, and §6Wood Planks§r. Other than that, you connect Mekanism cables to the back of the Generator and §eadd a §eheat source on any side of the generator§r, your cables should now be §efilled with energy§r.
